pkgmetadata.longdescription: Time-Dependent ROC Curve Estimation for Correlated Right-Censored Survival Data // This contains functions that can be used to estimate a smoothed and a non-smoothed (empirical) time- dependent receiver operating characteristic curve and the corresponding area under the receiver operating characteristic curve for correlated right-censored time-to-event data. See Beyene and Chen (2024) doi:10.1177/09622802231220496.
